meanings.sent1: She gets shirty when things don't go her way.
meanings.sent2: He was feeling shirty after a long day at work.
meanings.sent3: The cat looked shirty when it couldn't catch the laser pointer.
meanings.sent4: The dark clouds seemed shirty, ready to burst with rain at any moment.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's shirty expression warned the students to behave.
